altername_name: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi Fullmetal Alchemist: Senaka o Takuseshi Mono
name: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi: Fullmetal Alchemist: Yakusoku no Hi e
overview: Hagane no Renkinjutsushi: Fullmetal Alchemist - Yakusoku no Hi e is a Role-Playing game, developed by Crafts & Meister and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2010.
